description:
Proteome-level assessment of origin, prevalence and function of Leucine-Aspartic Acid (LD) motifs.

Source code for LD motif detection.

In this repository, we uploaded the necessary files to set up and environment to predict the LD motif from input sequence. We also have a server for LD motif predition : https://www.cbrc.kaust.edu.sa/ldmf/.

Users need to run scripts after changing the value of input parameters. The deatils of each parameter is also provide. The code is shared in the folder "src". All external jars are shared in the folder "ExternalJar_Required" There are two files that should be used for Amino Acid index. These files are also shared.

||| CORRECT NAME OF TOOL COULD ALSO BE 'LDMF', 'AVAILABILITY:LDMF', 'LD', 'LD motif'
name: LDmotif
